item.title: LDLC-Pro has broken my computer and blames it on me #fail
item.description: Iâ€™ve been unlucky enough to start buying at LDLC-Pro my IT material. They had a good reputation and based on it I went ahead and bought a computer, plus an extra SSD disc for another computer, plus some other stuff. It took them a bit longer than expected to deliver, but I was in no hurry so no big deal. Then my SSD disc failed, and you know how it is: catastrophic.

item.title: Kids Media Use By Platform: TV Rules, Computers Come 3rd
item.description: Get the full report: Generation M2: Media in the Lives of 8- to 18-Year-Olds and share your understanding of it and your ideas.
